package model;

import java.io.Serializable;
import java.util.Date;

public class JewelryOrder implements Serializable{
	private int id;
	private String name;
	private int Ring;
	private int Earrings;
	private int Necklace;
	private int Bracelet;
	private String order_date;
	
	
	
	public JewelryOrder() {
		super();
		// TODO Auto-generated constructor stub
	}
	public JewelryOrder(String name, int Ring, int Earrings,int Necklace,int Bracelet,String Order_date) {
		super();
		this.name = name;
		this.Ring = Ring;
		this.Earrings = Earrings;
		this.Necklace = Necklace;
		this.Bracelet = Bracelet;
        Date d=new Date();
		order_date=(1900+d.getYear())+"-"+(1+d.getMonth())+"-"+d.getDate();
		
		
	}
	public int getId() {
		return id;
	}
	public void setId(int id) {
		this.id = id;
	}
	public String getName() {
		return name;
	}
	public void setName(String name) {
		this.name = name;
	}
	public int getRing() {
		return Ring;
	}
	public void setRing(int ring) {
		Ring = ring;
	}
	public int getEarrings() {
		return Earrings;
	}
	public void setEarrings(int earrings) {
		Earrings = earrings;
	}
	public int getNecklace() {
		return Necklace;
	}
	public void setNecklace(int necklace) {
		Necklace = necklace;
	}
	public int getBracelet() {
		return Bracelet;
	}
	public void setBracelet(int bracelet) {
		Bracelet = bracelet;
	}

	public String getOrder_date() {
		return order_date;
	}
	public void setOrder_date(String order_date) {
		this.order_date = order_date;
	}
	public int getSum() {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		return 0;
	}
	public void setSum(int finalSum) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		
	}
	

}
